channel.title: BUbreakingHeadlines
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingHeadlines, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Jobs lost in every state and lifesaving cures not discovered: Possible impacts of research cuts
item.description: Ripple effects of the Trump administration’s crackdown on U.S. medical research promise to reach every corner of America.

item.title: Veterans fired from federal jobs say they feel betrayed, including some who voted for Trump

item.description: President Trump is expected to direct his secretary of education to dissolve the Department of Education by executive order this week, sources said.

item.title: Texas couple makes $161,000 per year, but is drowning in $90,000 credit card debt, spent $20,000 on California vacation

item.title: Stocks tumble as tariff fallout roils markets

item.title: WATCH: Golden retriever takes 'retriever' identity very seriously
